query_json Package¶

db Module¶

myway.apps.query_json.db.attrs_of(region_code)¶

Returns attributes of the region with given region code. If region not found, returns None.

myway.apps.query_json.db.children_of(region_code)¶

Returns an attribute list of children of the region with given region code. If region not found, returns None

myway.apps.query_json.db.cities_in(province_name)¶

Returns an attribute list of cities within the province. If province not found, return an empty list [].

myway.apps.query_json.db.node_of(region_code)¶

Returns a node with given region code. If region not found, return None

myway.apps.query_json.db.subareas_in(city_name)¶

Returns an attribute list of subareas within the city. If city not found, return an empty list []

file_queries Module¶

myway.apps.query_json.file_queries.get_file_list(request, base_dir_alias, relative_path)¶
myway.apps.query_json.file_queries.get_file_list_for_data_table(request, base_dir_alias, relative_path)¶

To work with dataTable

myway.apps.query_json.file_queries.list_dir(path)¶
myway.apps.query_json.file_queries.sizeof_fmt(num)¶

geo_queries Module¶

myway.apps.query_json.geo_queries.get_area_list(request, parent_region_code)¶

urls Module¶
